select a.id,a.tnNo,a.nickName,a.photo,r.friendGroup,r.remarkName from tn_user as a,tn_userrelation as r where r.friendId = a.id and r.userid = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

#{item}

select id, tnNo, nickName, enName, birthday, email, schoolId, subject, interest, sign, photo, animals, bloodType, constellation, role, gender, level, remark, photoxs, photoms, photomd, photolg, photoxg,spacebgmd, spacebglg, city, friendAmount, todayVisit, totalVisit, blogAmount from tn_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
